title: Senior Staff Software Engineer
details: Led 2 projects from scratch to production.
Led various teams of 3-5 engineers.
Developed various modules for a project that uses OpenAI GPT Model to automate sales support.
Interviewed new candidates for the dev team.
Mentored multiple junior engineers and arranged training workshops.

title: Software Engineer
details: Served a user base spanning across multiple countries in the European Union.
Developed various modules for Supply Chain Management System.
Worked on an automated tracking mechanism for delivery carriers.
Added features to existing microservices.

title: Assistant Lead Engineer
details: Served a user base of more than 57 million.
Worked on AWS deployment optimization.
Contribution in designing system architecture for several new projects.

title: Senior Engineer
details: Served a user base of more than 50 million.
Worked on system middleware using Spring Boot and DynamoDB.
Designed auto-debit module to handle peak-hour transactions.
Wrote AWS Lambda with node.js for the auto-debit middleware backend.
Interviewed new candidates for the Solution Engineering team.

title: Senior Software Engineer
details: Served a user/customer base of around 25 companies and 8000 individuals.
Designed several microservice module architectures for SS ERP
Automated the backup service for the central server of SS ERP.

title: Software Engineer
details: Served a user/customer base of around 15 companies and 2000 individuals.
Developed Smart Squirrels POS system with Codeigniter.
Developed websites with Codeigniter and Wordpress for various companies.
